scenario_text.value:
What was I thinking? I can’t believe
I almost stopped trusting you.

It’s fine, Aoi. I get it. I can’t make you
trust me.

Especially after what happened with Lopmon.
I don’t know why he turned out like that.

But I can promise you this: I’ll never betray
you! I never want to see you get hurt!

If I start to become like him, I’ll...I’ll do
whatever I have to and make myself go away!

It’s okay, Labramon. You don’t have to do
that. I trust you! So stay with me, okay?

But I can promise you this: I’ll never betray
you! I hope you believe me...

And if anything happens to me, I...I hope
you’ll be there to protect me.

I will. Don’t worry, Labramon. I trust you!
So stay with me, okay?

(It seems like whatever happens, those two
are going to be okay. I’m glad.)
